Sideways limped along as the two Minicons helped him stand. "Heh, 
didn't e=
xpect these bio freaks to be the cunning... I won't forget 
that bots face.=
.. He lifted his arm as the techno poison continued to 
play with his circu=
ts. "We're coming up to the ship..." He limped up 
to a clearing... huh?" H=
e looked down at Crosswise. "Out of three 
your the only one not damaged an=
d you take us to the wrong ship?"

towards the ark. whe=
n she saw Side way. She landed some miles far of him and

o her beast mode. Cautionsly she walked towards the group,

Sideways:

Sideways limped up to the ship and sh=
ook his head. "Well we might as well 
turn around and try again." He stoof =
up right and transformed and the two 
smaller bots formed into a rider and =
the two started off.

Blackstorm:

w them

Sideways smiled to himself. "That dragon bot was a bombshell wasn't=
 she 
boys." The minicons whistled and he laughed and braked. "Hmmm Looks l=
ike the 
terrains rough ahead, Rook you check out see if we can get by on w=
heels, me 
and crosswise will stay here." He transformed and became his bot=
 form and 
crosswise formed his head...
BlackStorm:
=A0
BlackStorm stopped =
and hide, she was very daring following a lone that bot... 
Perhaps she hav=
e to call her babysiter after all, plus she have to come back 
to her patro=
l. She moved slowly trying to left the area.

SideWays looked around. "What=
 do you mean you heard something?" He turned and 
a visor slid over his eye=
s. "A bot!" He raised his arms and the guns slid 
out. "Freeze!"

BlackStor=
m:

The femme stopped and=A0 waited. But she was full awared 

Sideways rea=
ched her quickly. "Name, faction, etc, be quick about it."

Blackstorm:

"B=
lackStorm,=A0 Decepticon, Scout"replied the femme"May I transform?"

Sidewa=
ys chuckled. "Your either young or neive." A true decepticon would have 
li=
ed." He nodded. "Heh, go ahead, but know this theres another bot with me 
a=
nd he'll be back soon."

Blackstorm:

Blackstorm felt as fool, MAxima would=
n't like this and her chances to get 
good mission and=A0receive honors fro=
m Hydras was vanishing. She tranformed to 
her bot mode. 

Sideways smiled.=
 "Why your a child." He chuckled. "And your a decepticon., 
well then Black=
Storm, I am Sideways, and i too am a Decepticon." He lowered 
his weapon.
